## Induction Effect 

```{r}
dfsub |> 
  select(participant_id, starts_with("Induction")) |> 
  pivot_longer(-participant_id) |> 
  mutate(label = case_when(
    name == "Induction_Q1" ~ "blabla1",
    name == "Induction_Q2" ~ "blabla2",
    name == "Induction_Q3" ~ "blabla3",
    name == "Induction_Q4" ~ "blabla4",
    TRUE ~ "blabla5"
  )) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = value, y = label, fill = participant_id)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::percent, limits = c(0, 1))
```
